body_html:
Debugging a little bit more, I found that the function call ncclCommInitAll(comms.get(), devices.size(), devices.data()) located at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/cuda/nccl.cpp#L29 is the one getting stuck.
I am happy to work on a fix if I get some pointers. Thank you !!
body_text:
Debugging a little bit more, I found that the function call ncclCommInitAll(comms.get(), devices.size(), devices.data()) located at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/cuda/nccl.cpp#L29 is the one getting stuck.
I am happy to work on a fix if I get some pointers. Thank you !!
body:
Debugging a little bit more, I found that the function call `ncclCommInitAll(comms.get(), devices.size(), devices.data())` located at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/cuda/nccl.cpp#L29 is the one getting stuck.
I am happy to work on a fix if I get some pointers. Thank you !!
